Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Thank you, thank you.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Thank you very much.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Friends, delegates and fellow Americans: I humbly and gratefully accept your nomination for the presidency of the United States.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: USA, USA, USA, USA, USA.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Who would have believed that when we started this journey because we are a team would have received almost 14 million votes the most in the history of the Republican party and that the Republican party would get 60 percent more votes than it received eight years ago.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Who would have believed this.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Who would have believed this.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: The Democrats on the other hand received 20 percent fewer votes than they got four years ago.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Not so good.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Not so good.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Together, we will lead our party back to the White House, and we will lead our country back to safety, prosperity, and peace.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We will be a country of generosity and warmth.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: But we will also be a country of law and order.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Our Convention occurs at a moment of crisis for our nation.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: The attacks on our police, and the terrorism of our cities, threaten our very way of life.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Any politician who does not grasp this danger is not fit to lead our country.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Americans watching this address tonight have seen the recent images of violence in our streets and the chaos in our communities.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Many have witnessed this violence personally, some have even been its victims.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: I have a message for all of you: the crime and violence that today afflicts our nation will soon, and I mean very soon, come to an end.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Beginning on January 20th of 2017, safety will be restored.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: The most basic duty of government is to defend the lives of its own citizens.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Any government that fails to do so is a government unworthy to lead.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: It is finally time for a straightforward assessment of the state of our nation.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: I will present the facts plainly and honestly.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We cannot afford to be so politically correct anymore.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: So if you want to hear the corporate spin, the carefully-crafted lies, and the media myths the Democrats are holding their convention next week.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Go there.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: But here, at our convention, there will be no lies.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We will honor the American people with the truth, and nothing else.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: These are the facts: Decades of progress made in bringing down crime are now being reversed by this Administration's rollback of criminal enforcement.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Homicides last year increased by 17 percent in America's fifty largest cities.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: That's the largest increase in 25 years.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: In our nation's capital, killings have risen by 50 percent.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: They are up nearly 60% in nearby Baltimore.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: In the President's hometown of Chicago, more than 2,000 people have been the victims of shootings this year alone.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: And more than 4,000 have been killed in the Chicago area since he took office.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: The number of police officers killed in the line of duty has risen by almost 50% compared to this point last year.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Nearly 180,000 illegal immigrants with criminal records, ordered deported from our country, are tonight roaming free to threaten peaceful citizens.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: The number of new illegal immigrant families who have crossed the border so far this year already exceeds the entire total from 2015.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: They are being released by the tens of thousands into our communities with no regard for the impact on public safety or resources.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: One such border-crosser was released and made his way to Nebraska.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: There, he ended the life of an innocent young girl named Sarah Root.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: She was 21 years-old, and was killed the day after graduating from college with a 4.0 Grade Point Average.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Number one in her class.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Her killer was then released a second time, and he is now a fugitive from the law.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: I've met Sarah's beautiful family.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: But to this Administration, their amazing daughter was just one more American life that wasn't worth protecting.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: No more.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: One more child to sacrifice on the order and on the altar of open borders.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: What about our economy?

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Again, I will tell you the plain facts that have been edited out of your nightly news and your morning newspaper: Nearly 4 in 10 African-American children are living in poverty, while 58% of African-American youth are now not employed.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: 2 million more Latinos are in poverty today than when President Obama took his oath of office less than eight years ago.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Another 14 million people have left the workforce entirely.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Household incomes are down more than $4,000 since the year 2000.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: That's sixteen years ago.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Our trade deficit has reached an all-time high think of this, think of this, our trade deficit is nearly $800 billion, think of that, 800 billion dollars, last year alone.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We're going to fix that.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: The budget is no better.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: President Obama has almost doubled our national debt to more than $19 trillion, and growing.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: And yet, what do we have to show for it?

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Our roads and bridges are falling apart, our airports are Third World condition, and forty-three million Americans are on food stamps.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Now let us consider the state of affairs abroad.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Not only have our citizens endured domestic disaster, but they've lived through one international humiliation after another.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: One after another.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We all remember the images of our sailors being forced to their knees by their Iranian captors at gunpoint.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: This was just prior to the signing of the Iran deal, which gave back to Iran $150 billion and gave us absolutely nothing – it will go down in history as one of the worst deals ever negotiated.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Another humiliation came when president Obama drew a red line in Syria – and the whole world knew it meant absolutely nothing.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: In Libya, our consulate – the symbol of American prestige around the globe – was brought down in flames.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: America is far less safe – and the world is far less stable – than when Obama made the decision to put Hillary Clinton in charge of America's foreign policy.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Let's defeat her in November, okay?

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: I am certain that it was a decision that President Obama truly regrets.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Her bad instincts and her bad judgment – something pointed out by Bernie Sanders – are what caused so many of the disasters unfolding today.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Let's review the record.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: In 2009, pre-Hillary, ISIS was not even on the map.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Libya was stable.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Egypt was peaceful.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Iraq was seeing and really a big big reduction in violence.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Iran was being choked by sanctions.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Syria was somewhat under control.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: After four years of Hillary Clinton, what do we have?

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: ISIS has spread across the region, and the entire world.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Libya is in ruins, and our Ambassador and his staff were left helpless to die at the hands of savage killers.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Egypt was turned over to the radical Muslim brotherhood, forcing the military to retake control.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Iraq is in chaos.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Iran is on the path to nuclear weapons.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Syria is engulfed in a civil war and a refugee crisis, now threatens the West.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: After fifteen years of wars in the Middle East, after trillions of dollars spent and thousands of lives lost, the situation is worse than it has ever been before.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: This is the legacy of Hillary Clinton: death, destruction, terrorism, and weakness.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: But Hillary Clinton's legacy does not have to be America's legacy.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: The problems we face now – poverty and violence at home, war and destruction abroad – will last only as long as we continue relying on the same politicians who created them in the first place.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: A change in leadership is required to produce a change in outcomes.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Tonight, I will share with you my plan for action for America.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: The most important difference between our plan and that of our opponents, is that our plan will put America First.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Americanism, not globalism, will be our credo.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: As long as we are led by politicians who will not put America First, then we can be assured that other nations will not treat America with respect.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: The respect that we deserve.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: The American People will come first once again.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: My plan will begin with safety at home – which means safe neighborhoods, secure borders, and protection from terrorism.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: There can be no prosperity without law and order.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: On the economy, I will outline reforms to add millions of new jobs and trillions in new wealth that can be used to rebuild America.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: A number of these reforms that I will outline tonight will be opposed by some of our nation's most powerful special interests.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: That's because these interests have rigged our political and economic system for their exclusive benefit.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Believe me.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: It's for their benefit.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Big business, elite media and major donors are lining up behind the campaign of my opponent because they know she will keep our rigged system in place.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: They are throwing money at her because they have total control over everything single thing she does.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: She is their puppet, and they pull the strings.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: That is why Hillary Clinton's message is that things will never change.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Never ever.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: My message is that things have to change – and they have to change right now.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Every day I wake up determined to deliver a better life for the people all across this nation that have been neglected, ignored, and abandoned.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: I have visited the laid-off factory workers, and the communities crushed by our horrible and unfair trade deals.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: These are the forgotten men and women of our country.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: And they are forgotten.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: But they're not going to be forgotten long.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: These are people who work hard but no longer have a voice.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: I am your voice.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: I have embraced crying mothers who have lost their children because our politicians put their personal agendas before the national good.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: I have no patience for injustice.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: How great are our police!

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: And how great is Cleveland?

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Thank you.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: I have no patience for injustice.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: No tolerance for government incompetence of which there is so much, no sympathy for leaders who fail their citizens.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: When innocent people suffer, because our political system lacks the will, or the courage, or the basic decency to enforce our laws – or still worse, has sold out to some corporate lobbyist for cash – I am not able to look the other way.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: And I won't look the other way.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: And when a Secretary of State illegally stores her emails on a private server, deletes 33,000 of them so the authorities can't see her crime, puts our country at risk, lies about it in every different form and faces no consequence – I know that corruption has reached a level like never ever before in our country.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: When the FBI Director says that the Secretary of State was "extremely careless" and "negligent," in handling our classified secrets, I also know that these terms are minor compared to what she actually did.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: They were just used to save her from facing justice for her terrible, terrible crimes.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: In fact, her single greatest accomplishment may be committing such egregious crime and getting away with it – especially when others who have done far less, have paid so dearly.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: When that same Secretary of State rakes in millions and millions of dollars trading access and favors to special interests and foreign powers I know the time for action has come.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: I have joined the political arena so that the powerful can no longer beat up on people who cannot defend themselves.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Nobody knows the system better than me.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Which is why I alone can fix it.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: I have seen firsthand how the system is rigged against our citizens, just like it was rigged against Bernie Sanders – he never had a chance.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Never had a chance.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: But his supporters will join our movement, because we will fix his biggest single issue: trade deals that strip our country of its jobs and strip us of our wealth as a country.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Millions of Democrats will join our movement, because we are going to fix the system so it works fairly and justly for all Americans.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: In this cause, I am proud to have at my side the next Vice President of the United States: Governor Mike Pence of Indiana.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: And a great guy.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We will bring the same economic success to America that Mike brought to Indiana.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Which is amazing.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: He's a man of character and accomplishment.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: He's the man for the job.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: The first task for our new Administration will be to liberate our citizens from the crime and terrorism and lawlessness that threatens our community.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: America was shocked to its core when our police officers in Dallas were so brutally executed.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Immediately after Dallas, we have seen continued threats and violence against our law enforcement officials.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Law officers have been shot or killed in recent days in Georgia, Missouri, Wisconsin, Kansas, Michigan and Tennessee.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: On Sunday, more police were gunned down in Baton Rouge, Louisiana.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Three were killed, and three were very, very badly injured.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: An attack on law enforcement is an attack on all Americans.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: I have a message to every last person threatening the peace on our streets and the safety of our police: when I take the oath of office next year, I will restore law and order to our country.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Believe me.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Believe me.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: I will work with, and appoint, the best and brightest prosecutors and law enforcement officials to get the job properly done.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: In this race for the White House, I am the Law And Order candidate.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: The irresponsible rhetoric of our President, who has used the pulpit of the presidency to divide us by race and color, has made America a more dangerous environment that frankly that I have ever seen of anybody in this room has ever watched or seen.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: This Administration has failed America's inner cities.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Remember, it has failed America's inner cities.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: It's failed them on education.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: It's failed them on jobs.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: It's failed them on crime.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: It's failed them in every way and at every single level.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: When I am President, I will work to ensure that all of our kids are treated equally, and protected equally.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Every action I take, I will ask myself: does this make better for young Americans in Baltimore, in Chicago, in Detroit, in Ferguson who have really, in every way folks, the same right to live out their dreams as any other child in America?

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Any other child.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: To make life safe for all of our citizens, we must also address the growing threats from outside the country.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We are going to defeat the barbarians of ISIS and we're going to defeat them fast.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Once again, France is the victim of brutal Islamic terrorism.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Men, women and children viciously mowed down.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Lives ruined.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Families ripped apart.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: A nation in mourning.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: The damage and devastation that can be inflicted by Islamic radicals has been proven over and over – at the World Trade Center, at an office party in San Bernardino, at the Boston Marathon, at a military recruiting center in Chattanooga, Tennessee.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: And many many other locations.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Only weeks ago, in Orlando, Florida, 49 wonderful Americans were savagely murdered by an Islamic terrorist.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: This time, the terrorist targeted LGBTQ community.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: No good, and we're going to stop it.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: As your President, I will do everything in my power to protect our LGBTQ citizens from the violence and oppression of a hateful foreign ideology.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Believe me.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: And I have to say as a Republican it is so nice to hear you cheering for what I just said.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Thank you.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: To protect us from terrorism, we need to focus on three things.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We must have the best, absolutely the best gathering of intelligence anywhere in the world.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: The best.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We must abandon the failed policy of nation building and regime change that Hillary Clinton pushed in Iraq, in Libya, in Egypt and in Syria.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Instead, we must work with all of our allies who share our goal of destroying ISIS and stamping out Islamic terrorism and doing it now, doing it quickly.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We're going to win.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We're going to win fast.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: This includes working with our greatest ally in the region, the State of Israel.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Recently, I have said NATO is obsolete because it did not properly cover terror.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: And also that many of the member countries were not paying their fair share.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: As usual, the United States has been picking up the costs.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Shortly thereafter, it was announced that NATO will be setting up a new program in order to combat terrorism.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: A true step in the right direction.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Lastly, and very importantly, we must immediately suspend immigration from any nation that has been compromised by terrorism until such time as proven vetting mechanisms have been put in place.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We don't want them in our country.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: My opponent has called for a radical 550% increase in Syrian, think of this.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Think of this, this is not believable but this is what's happening.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: A 550 percent increase in Syrian refugees on top of existing massive refugee flows coming into our country already under the leadership of President Obama.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: She proposes this despite the fact that there's no way to screen these refugees in order to find out who they are or where they come from.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: I only want to admit individuals into our country who will support our values and love our people.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Anyone who endorses violence, hatred or oppression is not welcome in our country and never ever will be.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Decades of record immigration have produced lower wages and higher unemployment for our citizens, especially for African-American and Latino workers.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We are going to have an immigration system that works, but one that works for the American people.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: On Monday, we heard from three parents whose children were killed by illegal immigrants: Mary Ann Mendoza, Sabine Durden, and my friend Jamiel Shaw.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: They are just three brave representatives of many thousands who have suffered so greatly.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Of all my travels in this country, nothing has affected me more, nothing even close I have to tell you, than the time I have spent with the mothers and fathers who have lost their children to violence spilling across our borders which we can solve.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We have to solve it.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: These families have no special interests to represent them.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: There are no demonstrators to protect them and certainly none to protest on their behalf.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: My opponent will never meet with them, or share in their pain.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Believe me.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Instead, my opponent wants Sanctuary Cities.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: But where was the sanctuary for Kate Steinle?

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Where was the Sanctuary for the children of Mary Ann, and Sabine and Jamiel?

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Where was sanctuary for all the other, it's so sad to even be talking about it, because we can solve this problem so quickly.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Where was the sanctuary for all of the Americans who have been so brutally murdered, and who have suffered so horribly?

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: These wounded American families have been alone.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: But they are not alone any longer.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Tonight, this candidate and the whole nation stand in their corner to support them, to send them our love, and to pledge in their honor that we will save countless more families from suffering and the same awful fate.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We are going to build a great border wall to stop illegal immigration, to stop the gangs and the violence, and to stop the drugs from pouring into our communities.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: I have been honored to receive the endorsement of America's Border Patrol Agents.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: And will work directly with them to protect the integrity of our lawful, lawful, lawful immigration system.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Lawful.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: By ending catch-and-release on the border, we will end the cycle of human smuggling and violence.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Illegal border crossings will go down.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We will stop it, it won't be happening very much anymore.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Believe me.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Peace will be restored.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: By enforcing the rules for millions who overstay their visas, our laws will finally receive the respect that they deserve.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Tonight, I want every American whose demands for immigration security have been denied – and every politician who has denied them – to listen very, very closely to the words I am about to say.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: On January 20th of 2017, the day I take the oath of office, Americans will finally wake up in a country where the laws of the United States are enforced.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We are going to be considerate and compassionate to everyone.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: But my greatest compassion will be for our own struggling citizens.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: USA.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: USA.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: USA.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: My plan is the exact opposite of the radical and dangerous immigration policy of Hillary Clinton.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Americans want relief from uncontrolled immigration.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Which is what we have now.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Communities want relief.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Yet Hillary Clinton is proposing mass amnesty, mass immigration, and mass lawlessness.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Her plan will overwhelm your schools and hospitals, further reduce your jobs and wages, and make it harder for recent immigrants to escape the tremendous cycle poverty that they're going through right now and make it almost impossible for them to join the middle class.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: I have a different vision for our workers.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: It begins with a new, fair trade policy that protects our jobs and stands up to countries that cheat.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Of which there are many.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: It's been a signature message of my campaign from day one, and it will be a signature feature of my presidency from the moment I take the oath of office.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: I have made billions of dollars in business making deals – now I'm going to make our country rich again.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Using the greatest business people in the world, which our country has, I am going to turn our bad trade agreements into great trade agreements.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: America has lost nearly-one third of its manufacturing jobs since 1997, following the enactment of disastrous trade deals supported by Bill and Hillary Clinton.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Remember, it was Bill Clinton who signed NAFTA, one of the worst economic deals ever made by our country.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Or frankly, any other country.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Never ever again.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: I am going to bring our jobs back to Ohio and Pennsylvania, and New York, and Michigan, and all of America – and I am not going to let companies move to other countries, firing their employees along the way, without consequence.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Not going to happen anymore.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: My opponent, on the other hand, has supported virtually every trade agreement that has been destroying our middle class.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: She supported NAFTA, and she supported China's entrance into the World Trade Organization – another one of her husband's colossal mistakes and disasters.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: She supported the job-killing trade deal with South Korea.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: She supported the Trans-Pacific Partnership.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Which will not only destroy our manufacturers, but will make America subject to the rulings of foreign governments.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: And it's not going to happen.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: I pledge to never sign any trade agreement that hurts our workers or that diminishes our freedom or independence.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We will never sign bad trade deals.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: America First again.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: America First.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Instead, I will make individual deals with individual countries.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: No longer will we enter into these massive transactions, with many countries, that are thousands of pages long – and which no one from our country even reads or understands.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We are going to enforce all trade violations, against any country that cheats.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: This includes stopping China's outrageous theft of intellectual property, along with their illegal product dumping, and their devastating currency manipulation.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: They are the greatest that ever came about.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: They are the greatest currency manipulators ever.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Our horrible trade agreements with China and many others will be totally renegotiated.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: That includes renegotiating NAFTA to get a much better deal for America – and we'll walk away if we don't get that kind of a deal.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Our country is going to start building and making things again.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Next comes the reform of our tax laws, regulations and energy rules.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: While Hillary Clinton plans a massive, and I mean massive, tax increase, I have proposed the largest tax reduction of any candidate who has run for the president this year – Democrat or Republican.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Middle-income Americans and businesses will experience profound relief, and taxes will be greatly simplified for everyone.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: I mean everyone.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: America is one of the highest-taxed nations in the world.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Reducing taxes will cause new companies and new jobs to come roaring back into our country.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Believe me, it'll happen and it'll happen fast.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Then we are going to deal with the issue of regulation, one of the greatest job-killers of them all.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Excessive regulation is costing our country as much as $2 trillion a year, and we will end it very, very quickly.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We are going to lift the restrictions on the production of American energy.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: This will produce more than $20 trillion in job-creating economic activity over the next four decades.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: My opponent, on the other hand, wants to put the great miners and the great steelworkers of our country out of work and out of business – that will never happen with Donald J Trump as president.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Our steelworkers and our miners are going back to work again.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: With these new economic policies, trillions and trillions of dollars will start flowing into our country.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: This new wealth will improve the quality of life for all Americans – We will build the roads, highways, bridges, tunnels, airports, and the railways of tomorrow.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: This, in turn, will create millions of more jobs.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We will rescue kids from failing schools by helping their parents send them to a safe school of their choice.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: My opponent would rather protect bureaucrats than serve American children.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: And that's what she's doing.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: And that's what's she's done.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We will repeal and replace disastrous Obamacare.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: You will be able to choose your own doctor again.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: And we will fix TSA at the airports!

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Which is a total disaster.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We're going to work with all of our students who are drowning in debt to take the pressure off these young people just starting out in their adult lives.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Tremendous problem.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We will completely rebuild our depleted military, and the countries that we protect, at a massive cost to us, will be asked to pay their fair share.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We will take care of our great Veterans like they have never been taken care of before.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: My just released 10 point plan has received tremendous veteran support.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We will guarantee those who serve this country will be able to visit the doctor or hospital of their choice without waiting five days on a line and dying.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: My opponent dismissed the VA scandal.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: One more sign of how out of touch she really is.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We are going to ask every Department Head in government to provide a list of wasteful spending projects that we can eliminate in my first 100 days.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: The politicians have talked about this for years, but I'm going to do it.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We are going to appoint justices of the United States Supreme Court who will uphold our laws and our Constitution.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: The replacement of our beloved Justice Scalia will be a person of similar views and principles and judicial philosophies.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Very important.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: This will be one of the most important issues decided by this election.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: My opponent wants to essentially abolish the 2nd amendment.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: I, on the other hand, received the early and strong endorsement of the National Rifle Association and will protect the right of all Americans to keep their families safe.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: At this moment, I would like to thank the evangelical and religious community because I'll tell you what.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Because the support they've given me, and I'm not sure I totally deserve it, has been so amazing.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: And has had such a big reason for me being here tonight.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: True.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: So true.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: They have so much to contribute to our politics, yet our laws prevent you from speaking your minds from your own pulpits.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: An amendment, pushed by Lyndon Johnson, many years ago, threatens religious institutions with a loss of their tax-exempt status if they openly advocate their political views.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Their voice has been taken away.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: I am going to work very hard to repeal that language and to protect free speech for all Americans.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We can accomplish these great things, and so much more – all we need to do is start believing in ourselves and in our country again.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Start believing.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: It is time to show the whole world that America Is Back – bigger, and better and stronger than ever before.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: In this journey, I'm so lucky to have at my side my wife Melania and my wonderful children, Don, Ivanka, Eric, Tiffany, and Barron: you will always be my greatest source of pride and joy.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: And by the way, Melania and Ivanka, did they do a job.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: My Dad, Fred Trump, was the smartest and hardest working man I ever knew.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: I wonder sometimes what he'd say if he were here to see this, and to see me, tonight.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: It's because of him that I learned, from my youngest age, to respect the dignity of work and the dignity of working people.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: He was a guy most comfortable in the company of bricklayers, and carpenters, and electricians and I have a lot of that in me also.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: I love those people.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Then there's my mother, Mary.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: She was strong, but also warm and fair-minded.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: She was a truly great mother.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: She was also one of the most honest and charitable people I have ever known, and a great great judge of character.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: She could pick 'em out from anywhere.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: To my sisters Mary Anne and Elizabeth, my brother Robert and my late brother Fred, I will always give you my love you are most special to me.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: I have had a truly great life in business.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: But now, my sole and exclusive mission is to go to work for our country – to go to work for you.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: It's time to deliver a victory for the American people.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We don't win anymore, but we are going to start winning again.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: But to do that, we must break free from the petty politics of the past.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: America is a nation of believers, dreamers, and strivers that is being led by a group of censors, critics, and cynics.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Remember: all of the people telling you you can't have the country you want, are the same people telling you that wouldn't stand, I mean they said Trump doesn't have a chance of being here tonight.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Not a chance.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: The same people.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Oh we love defeating those people.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Don't we?

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Don't we?

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Love it.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Love it.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Love it.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: No longer can we rely on those same people in the media media, and politics, who will say anything to keep a rigged system in place.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Instead, we must choose to Believe In America.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: History is watching us now.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We don't have much time, but history is watching.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: It's waiting to see if we will rise to the occasion, and if we will show the whole world that America is still free and independent and strong.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: I am asking for your support tonight so I can be your champion in the White House.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: And I will be your champion.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: My opponent asks her supporters to recite a three-word loyalty pledge.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: It reads: "I'm With Her".

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: I choose to recite a different pledge.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: My pledge reads: "I'M WITH YOU – THE AMERICAN PEOPLE."

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: I am your voice.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: So to every parent who dreams for their child, and every child who dreams for their future, I say these words to you tonight: I am With You, and I will fight for you, and I will win for you.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: To all Americans tonight, in all of our cities and in all of our towns, I make this promise: We Will Make America Strong Again.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We Will Make America Proud Again.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We Will Make America Safe Again.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: And We Will Make America Great Again.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: God bless you, and goodnight.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: I love you.
